评论概述: Very well built minimalist sandal, but
评论详情: This is a very nice barefooter but it is too long for my niece feet. Unfortunately, Xero shoes does not make sandal for kids.
I was looking for a comfortable minimalist, Hiking sandal. I like these ones very much however they were a bit wide and long so I did return them, but I will be buying a different version.
The shoe was the appropriate length for my foot. It seemed very flimsy.  It felt like I had a piece of cardboard strapped to my foot.  There was nothing attractive or comfortable about the shoe.

评论概述: So chintzy and impossible to get your foot secured.
评论详情: It's just looks like cheap foam from the dollar store with some tread and a thick ribbon. It's very difficult to get your foot in and out because you have to take the back ankle strap off and then velcrow it back on so the closure needs a total new redesign.  The company also chooses these clown colors.  Smells like cheap toxic plastic that's off gassing fumes.  Not a winner. I've returned them.
I love these so so much. Takes some time to get used to them, but in the best way. You can feel your feet using muscles that you are not used to using. LOVE THESE!

I purchased these looking for a "cheaper" barefoot shoe. However it is still expensive and I just wasn't sold on the shoe. There was a tab on the edges that held the straps and it felt like it was added after the fact and would break off easily or get snagged while walking/hiking. The sole was great and I liked the look of the straps, just couldn't get past that tab.

The straps are in the wrong place for these to be barefoot shoes. My feet hurt so badly by the end of my 1 hour hike because the straps were not allowing my toes to splay out like barefoot shoes would. They are too high on the toes. My left big toe felt sprained for days after wearing these. I tried to move my foot up more towards the end of the shoe so the strap was lower as it should be but then my toes hung off the end. Then there was the other strap problem. There needs to be a better holder for the strap at the inside lower part of the ankle because I would get it where I wanted it but the strap tightens on its own around my ankle instead of staying in place. Each point of turn for the strap should be able to secure there so it doesn’t tighten past where you want it. I wear a 9.5 and decided to get a 9 because they don’t have half sizes. It would have been the perfect fit if the straps had been lower on the toes. In the picture my left big toe is out showing the shoe would have still fit if the strap had been lowered. Instead that toe was hurting so badly.

评论概述: Finally found a pair of sandals I love!
评论详情: When I tell you I have ordered 8 different sandals that's the truth. I've tried so many different brands and I have an extremely high arch so it's a little confusing to me why these flat barefoot sandals feel the best. I've always been told to get arch support. Well these feel great for now.
I have short toes and a wide toe box and am concerned I will be prone to tipping on the flexible toe area.  I am going to try the trek next and see how it goes.  Lovely style.
Please don’t ever change this shoe or make improvements. It’s perfect just as it is.
I wear these shoes everywhere and I love them. In the water, hiking, exploring, grocery shopping. 🤣 everywhere!
These are so ugly--but so comfortable!  I walk daily and didn't know how comfortable they would be; but I'm actually really liking them!
I think vibram are more comfortable so far
I wear so many shoes from this company. Love them!!!!
Very comfortable, seems like wearing barefoot corrects my back.

评论概述: Very extremely wide.  Can't wear these, too wide.
评论详情: These shoes are for extremely wide feet.

Cute, comfortable and barely there, which is a dream for my wide, flat feet. Wandered the Botanical Garden in Montréal for like 5-6 hours without getting foot sore. Sandal straps often hit me in funny places and cause blisters, but no problem with these, which are smooth and soft anyway. Thought the toe might be floppy, but I adjusted the strap to move my foot forward and it was fine. Ran next to my kid on a bike and didn’t worry about it. Wore them in the water and they dried faster than my old Tevas. Thought I might be able to feel the lugs through the thin sole but I don’t notice them. My only complaint is the lugs under the arch are too close together. The sole flexes with your foot, so these really grab and hold on to dirt and gravel, which is next to impossible to clean out of them. I’ll never walk indoors in them again. On the trail they grab and hold onto wet leaf littler, which compromises traction. Fix that and they’d be a five star sandal.

评论概述: Great sandals but the velcro sucks
评论详情: We love xerox shoes but the velcro on these wore out after a month and a half and that makes them pretty much unusable and I can't seem to get a hold of anyone to get help.

评论概述: My feet are free to move all summer! Love them.
评论详情: I am not into spending too much on anything but shoes!! Why? Because if my feet are happy, I can keep going!! And these shoes are right up there with my Five finger Vibram water shoes, but more comfortable. I am so glad I researched until i discovered these amazing minimalistic sandals! In the summer especially, less is more. I highly recommend this product! The strap is a little long, but that’s where creativity comes in. I just tuck it under and that’s it!

评论概述: 10 out of 10 - Ordered 50 pairs of shoes, these win
评论详情: They are not heavy. You can walk miles. They are great on sensitive feet. No evil buckles.  Run try to size in a 7. Get them!
This is my 3rd pair of these sandals, I feel the quality is different, not as good as my previous pairs.

I walk about 4ish miles a day and bought these to be my summer walking shoes, my expectations have been exceeded!!! They are durable, comfortable and cute, all the boxes have been checked. Def recommend!
I'm usually a size women's 11 but the 11s were way too big. The 10s fit perfect. Love these. So light and comfy and everything I wanted.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for!
评论详情: This brand is great! This is my second pair from them but new to this style and they are great all around!

It seems like most Xero shoes run small in my experience, but these sandals are on the big side. They fit okay, just the toe area is a bit of a trip hazard. I might try to trim them down. Otherwise, they are comfortable- I just walked a few miles down the beach and no blisters at all.
I wear them every where
Very light. Staps stay put (didn't loosen it tighten as you walk). Cute. Comfy. But the rubber already had areas of wear a after wearing for one day.

I traveled around Southeast Asia for two and a half weeks and these were pretty much the only shoe I wore. We did tons of walking and I had no blisters or soreness. They're perfect for traveling because they're so small and lightweight. The style is really simple and goes with just about everything. I only wish the top of the shoe was a different material or texture because when it gets wet or my feet are a little sweaty it feels a little slippery.

it took me a little while to figure out the best way to fasten them around my foot and ankle -- but when I achieved the correct fit, it was pure magic on my feet. I run barefoot on my treadmill, and now achieved the same wonderful freeing feeling using these sandals on the trail. Absolutely smitten with these sandals!
I love these shoes!  I get lots of compliments on them!  They are a neutral shade so I can wear them with any casual clothes! The Velcro stopped working about 6 months after I purchased them.

So far I have worn my sandals inside my house. They have to be reset each time i take them off. I guess there is a learning curve to these .I am new to their sandal and they feel a bit exposed from my previous go to brands. I will see how it goes.
I have no need to take my shoes off. These sandals are weightless and easy to hike in. They’re the closest thing to barefoot I’ve experienced.

I've worn Keen and Teva shoes/sandals for as long as I can recall, but have had problems with the soles on Keens coming apart.  I wasn't sure about these, but I honestly like them.  I'm flat-footed and have had several corrective surgeries, but these are fine by me.

Oh my gash! I live in Florida so always ware sandals! I looked for a pair who can get wet and can hike with me on a Camino!! This is a perfect pair of sandals! Light! Fits well and walks well! I totally love them and can only recommend them

评论概述: Xero Shoes Z-Trail: Where Comfort Meets Adventure!
评论详情: My wife affectionately dubs them 'comfort in sandal form,' and they truly live up to the name. These sandals are incredibly comfortable and highly practical! We reside in an area where temperatures soar to around 30 or 40 degrees Celsius (86-104 degrees Fahrenheit). Despite the heat, my wife wears them all day, practically only taking them off to sleep at night. They have proven to be incredibly practical now that we have a one-year-old who is eager to explore the world. With these sandals, she can confidently accompany him wherever he goes.  Featuring multiple adjustment points and a Velcro strap at the back, they provide the flexibility to tailor the fit throughout the day for either more grip or added comfort.  Remarkably lightweight, they almost feel weightless, and the traction is excellent for walks on various terrains—be it soil, grass, or rocks. She claims it feels like she's not wearing anything, allowing a refreshing breeze to pass between her toes.  These sandals are completely flat, light, comfortable, yet robust and stylish. She has been wearing them for almost five months, and she loves them! So pleased with her purchase, she already has her eyes on another pair for when these eventually wear out. In fact, she convinced me to get a pair this month too! I'll be sharing our experience with them in a few days. Wholeheartedly recommended!

They are great shoes for very casual wear. I bought these for a longterm travel thinking they would be great for town walking and hiking but there wore down very fast. The Velcro wore off after a couple of weeks, which was really frustrating. I ended up having to throw them away after 2 months. IMO not worth the price.

I enjoy being barefoot, but this hard rubber sole with straps it just not what I was expecting. Walked on tile to try them on and see if they were comfortable. Well, they were not. Little flexibility in the sole. The straps had to be adjusted and dangled annoyingly. Just not comfortable. Not sure if they adjust to your feet and eventually become comfortable, but I am not willing to try for $85. Sorry, but that price is outrageous for rubber and straps.
Perfect for ground feel, and look cute (for a sporty sandal) and overall great shoe.

评论概述: Not a good fit for a narrow foot
评论详情: I have to agree with the person who said these sandals could use additional straps - her foot too wide - mine too thin. I regret not returning them when I had the opportunity.

Best sandals I've ever had! Eliminated foot pain I had from previous shoes! The quality was great, I wore them every day this summer, often on hikes on various terrain. Even when wet they provided stability on uneven ground. They smelled a bit after I walked through swamp water, but after rinsing and drying in the sun there was no smell. The only complaint is that I wish the straps were longer, as I have a tall foot. But that being said, it didn't hinder me from wearing them all the time.
The best shoes, for every day use!! I love it!! Just buy it
I wouldn’t recommend.

I wanted barefoot sandals. Zero drop+wide toe box, dynamicly flexible sandal. This is what I wanted.  When I bought this product I expected I would have these issues but you may want to avoid these issues.  I find it easiest to get in and out of these sandals with the heal strap which is not the easiest way to do that. The tread under the ball of my feet seem to be wearing quite quickly. We will see how long these sandals last.

评论概述: My favorite shoe for 8 years now!
评论详情: I have been wearing the Xero Z trails for 8 years now. This is my 4th pair. If you like light weight minimal sandals that you can do all outdoor activities in and feel totally free look no further. My life would not be the same without these sandals. I'm pretty sure I will wear them in my coffin when I die in 70 years.

评论概述: Not very flexible or light weight.
评论详情: If you like very minimal barefoot shoes like soft star, etc you will hate these. The soles are not flexible like virbram and the fit is odd. I will not buy this brand again.

I adore these shoes. Wore the hell out of them everyday for 10 months. Heavy use, on my feet 8 hours a day. Just now starting to break at the heal of the sandal. Which I'm not even mad about because of how much abuse I put these shoes through! No back pain, no knee pain, no hip pain. My balance is much better able to lift my arches because I can grab the ground with my toes the way I should. Stand on my heels the way I should. I'm buying my second pair. Hope to ware this shoe for the rest of my life honestly.
These keep my posture and alignment and hug my feet. So comfy and so great for pain prevention!

My toes have never felt so free. I love how adjustable the straps are. Most sandals I feel like my feet are strapped down with little ability to move. These keep you both secure and maintain mobility and range of motion. They are also very comfortable. I wouldn’t rate them as true barefoot shoes as the trail grips on the bottom provide a little extra stability and cushion but they are definitely close. I wasn’t sure about the heel bumper but I am definitely seeing how it helps to keep your foot from sliding off. I haven’t taken these on the trail yet but anticipate the trail grips will keep me stable.

This is my second pair.  I would not jump into these if you have not eased into barefoot minimalist shoes.  But I love these.  They fit to my size, the footbed is comfortable and flexible.  Excellent purchase if you are a serious barefoot enthusiast.

I love these shoes so much that I own 4 pairs! Looks good enough to dress up or down an outfit. Great for the beach. I wear these traveling as they are so easy to slip on when in a motel to replace slippers.

I was hesitant to switch from chacos to barefoot sandals, but after wearing barefoot shoes all winter I couldn’t go back to my chacos full time. I was getting knee and back pain and knew it was the arch support in the sandals that I no longer needed. These are so comfy and I have no knee/ back pain! I wore them all around an aquarium and to a baseball game and was still comfortable at the end of the day. If you’ve never worn barefoot shoes before that might not be the case but as someone who as adjusted to the switch, I won’t ever go back!

评论概述: Absolutely love these sandals, but runs big
评论详情: Most Xeros run small. Not these! But since they were my first “barefoot sandal” I didn’t realize it until past the return window. Next time I’ll get it right and there WILL be a next time. I love these sandals!

Great shoes. Wear 61/2 to 7. Took a 6. Feel like ur barefoot but with protection. Do have do get use to them cause zero gravity so our body not use to that. I can wear about 4 hrs then gotta take break but I have awful back issues Dusty color is perfect. Goes with everything

They are colorful, adjustable and flexible so like them. However very pricey and overall I would not recommend them. Same usefulness as a good thong.  It does not grip the sand or ground well.  Like the little part at the end that sort of keeps the foot in “place” but not. More of a “guide”  Minimalistic yes. Wore them maybe 7 times and they are wearing the soles and upper part, so not that qualitative.

I bought these for camp shoes backpacking. The size 10 came in at 5.1 ounces each shoe. Solo backpacking with my dog, every ounce matters. I knew they were light, I did not know how much I’d like them. They are Super comfortable and great fitting . Shoe adjustment works great. The treads were stable and had great traction on a variety of surfaces. I felt very confident in them. They do not slide around on your foot. This is a much more solid shoe than I thought it would be for the weight and construction.
Walked and ran and used them as recovery after a long day of hiking. I would recommend them.
They fit well. But after 2 weeks, the toe area is already peeling off (& no, I do not scrape the toes when I walk).

I'm completely sold on "barefeet" shoes! These are extremely comfortable and very durable. My only complaint is that they are a bit too pricy for the materials they are made of. I think around $30 bucks would be appropriate. But, we shall see how long my pair lasts. If they actually last longer than one year, than maybe $45 a pair. I would buy a few pair at a time if they weren't so expensive.

评论概述: I really wanted to like these
评论详情: I tried them, it wasn’t a success. And it’s too bad. Bc they are cute…..But my foot slides right on through these, and the straps are weird. That’s the only word I’ve got is weird.  Pass, and find a different brand.

I did a try before you buy with another sandal, a sneaker and a Mary Jane. These absolutely won out. I could only get one shoe right now and this is the one. Living in the desert southwest and having my feet open to the air for the last 8 years in Birkenstock sandals, my feet sweat an awful lot in closed toe shoes. These ran absolutely true to eu size for me. In birks I wear a 37. Whatever size that is on the size chart, they're true to size
I am constantly barefoot. I started walking our trails recently, these are as close to barefoot as they come.

Amazing comfort if you are used to zero-drop, low-stack (no cushioning), no arch support (if not, then transition into these by wearing Altra or Teva for a few months first). Awesome traction too, but I will not wear mine on hiking trails because little rocks and things easily slip in, so not much protection there. Opt instead for the closed athletic shoes by Xero or Vivobarefoot for the open trails. But otherwise, these are perfect for sub/urban sidewalks. Sooo cute when paired with summer dresses too!

I wanted to love these but they are super wide. I wear a size 8 in shoes. I bought the 8. Is a little bit big. I think if I exchanged them the 7 would be too small. Half size would fit perfect.  I wore minalist sandal before. I'll up date review after a few months.
Next best thing to wearing nothing at all!!
I’ve been dabbling in barefoot/zero drop shoes to try to fix some of my foot issues. I really love these sandals, they feel comfortable and they are cute and my feet seem to be improving

These are comfy for walking around, and I like that it doesn’t have anything between the toes. I wanted to use these for going in the water but they’re not the best. I slipped right away the first time I used them on the beach

As a preface I'm a veteran chaco wearer for 30+ years. I have very high arches so I always assumed I needed to have shoes with high arches. However, after doing some research, I realized maybe that wasn't the best thing for my feet. So I have been slowly transitioning to minimalist shoes. I found these sandals fairly easy to acclimate to. However, I have bunions on both feet and anyone with bunions knows they're kind of unsightly and the sandals definitely don't cover them up. The pros are they are lightweight and seem to have a good grip on the sole. The cons for me are the velcro strap in the back, if you are an animal lover and have fur in your house, you understand that velcro doesn't last too long. Normally I wear anything from a size 6 to 8 depending on the shoe and had originally ordered a seven but they were way too large so I had to drop down to a 6 and they fit fairly well but occasionally the heel cup in the back is uncomfortable and the straps that go around the ankle are too long. Normally I would just cut the straps off and burn them, but these don't look like they're meant to be done like that. The footbed of the sandals are not good when they get wet. My feet slip around in them a lot so that's unfortunate. And after wearing them for a full day of work on tile floor, my feet definitely feel the impact. Another issue for me coming from Chacos that have a thick sole and living in a sandy climate is I get a lot more dirt and debris in my sandals since they are thin soled. It's not a game changer but I wish I could actually wear these sandals and be able to return them and not have the "return in like new condition stipulation", if so I probably would have said no but I guess that's how they get you. It was also sad to see the 'Made in China' on the shoes but isn't everything these days. We shall see how long they last.

These are 4 stars because I am satisfied with the feel, comfort, and wear (picky shoe buyer)..but the only thing that needs revisiting is the top strap is too long once tightened. I had to cut it short, melt the edge with a lighter, then hand sew Velcro on the inside so it will stay close to the shoe. Now they are perfect! Just hoping modifications will last. Still happy with purchase.
I like that it’s adjustable, flexible and looks good.

I wore these for a week at Disney World and had zero foot issues! On past trips I've had to rotate my shoes because of pain, discomfort and/or blisters. Not this trip! I've finally found the most comfortable sandals! They also never smelled after long, hot, and sometimes wet days at the parks. These will definitely be my go-to sandals this summer!

I've put miles and miles and miles on these shoes. Never had a blister or any rubbing, they're just that adjustable so they fit perfect. They've held up to life and have done it with style! Best sandals ever!

评论概述: Wrong item sent and no option to exchange
评论详情: I love the shoes.....dislike tremendously the seller.  I ordered "Dusty Rose" for $40.00.  I received Black and no option to exchange, only to return and purchase again for $84.00!!!  Ridiculous and a scam.

I might be a weirdo but I hated the chacos I bought. I camp and hike and I was looking for something lightweight. These feel comfortable and fit true to my 8 size. Wearing them around house now and hopefully they will be equally reliable when I put them in the water

I tried these with Amazon's Prime Wardrobe. I was glad to have purchased a women's and mens style in these. I'm a 9 in women's and I ordered a 7 in mens, the mens ended up being too small but that was fine because I just ordered a size bigger to fit the way I wanted. I actually prefer the mens to the women's due to the straps on the mens being slightly wider in style. I have very long, narrow feet and the mens still fit wonderfully. I love the way these sandals fit in general, how light they feel and they are exactly what I'm looking for in a zero drop, barefoot, minimalist shoe. The price point is fair compared to other "barefoot" shoes/sandals (granted we all wish things were cheaper haha). I really liked the black compared to the beige "tree design" that I ordered in the women's.  All in all, I can't wait to get more and wear them this summer!
These are my second pair of shoes from this company. They are everything they say they are and an added perk is ordering from a small family owned company! Quick delivery as well
These sandals are way better than I expected! Sooo comfortable! Highly recommended.

评论概述: Ankle strap with velcro too short..
评论详情: Not made properly. Ankle strap/Velcro it to short to be used.. company making less quality stuff slot..

评论概述: Cheap Cheap Cheap Do not buy!!!!
评论详情: This is an absolute robbery. The material is like cloth/plastic mix that weighs a few grams. I highly doubt they will last more than a few weekends. Very minimalist, but for around $90??? Nope, these are like a $10 item. I do not recommended them to anyone.

Lightweight, easy to slip on and off, durable.  I bought these shoes for a trip to the beach and loved them!  They were comfortable right out of the box.  We walked a lot that trip and I never had sore feet.  Planning to order another style from Xero.
These fell apart from the soles after just 6 weeks of wear (in wet weather). Such a disappointment!

After trying a lot of other brands and sport sandals I finally tried these. They are wonderful. I didn't feel the need to take them off as soon as I walked in the door. I wear a 9 but usually need to size up in sandals because of my foot shape. I did not size up this time. The straps hit at just the right places to feel secure. I love that they are adjustable. The backs are adjustable as well.
Me agrado el estilo lo ligero que son,en pocas palabras es lo que esperaba de los huaraches.
Wife and I both have a pair. We wear them EVERYWHERE. My favorite footwear overall of my entire life. Makes your feet feel so light and comfy and free
These shoes are one of my favorites.  I have several Teva, Ecco, and Sorels and these shoes rank up there as far as comfort goes.  They fit as expected and straps allow for adjustment.
They stay on my feet. I wish I didn't have to unstrap them each time to put them on tho.

The price has to be reflective of there being zero competition for sandals in the industry because the pad part the foot sits on wears QUICKLY.  Great little shoe for those of us who hate wearing shoes. Excellent in wooded trails. I wear them daily.

Hiked and ran with these AND they were even more comfortable when wet. Not understanding any review that says they don’t fit or stretched out or were too tight…there are 3 adjustment places. As my feet swelled on the plane, I loosened them up in 30 seconds. A great buy! I bought the wide width, and they were perfect. I will definitely buy again in another color.  Couldn’t have asked for better.

Only wish it had 3 adjustment straps instead of 1, keeps loosening on the toes, would be fine but it makes my foot slide too much. If I put it tighter it squeezes the top of my foot. I do have wider feet so that could be part of it. Other then that I really like these sandals.

评论概述: Feels as close as possible to barefoot
评论详情: Sandals fit as expected,  there's a break in phase and getting used too walking in them.  Blue purple color is my favorite,  glad this was an option.  As close to barefoot with some protection.

评论概述: Great Minimalist trail running sandal, funky tan lines
评论详情: I had the original Zeroshoes Z-trail sandals, and loved them, as I have wide midfoot as well as forefoot, and my feet don't hang over the sides. I wore them for years, until finally the buckles wouldn't hold anymore and they kept getting loose as I ran, and the treads on the bottom side of the sole where I land and push off was wearing out. I saw that this model had sturdier material better bite on the buckles, so hoping they'd last longer. -The straps aren't as soft as before, so they do require some break-in and callous buildup for wide feet like mine. (Don't go out on a hard 7 mile trail run first thing lol.) -The bite on the buckles is much better, they hold the straps in place and don't loosen up. -The new layer on the footbed is very good, has better grip between the foot and shoe when wet. Still slip a little, but as long as the straps are tight enough, foot won't slide forward out of the front of the sandal on fast steep descents. -Fun tan lines.  So far I've work them on 10 milers on trails and roads. Because they are true minimal footwear, running fast along dry riverbeds, and down rough, rocky un-maintained carriage roads does beat the soles of the feet pretty hard, but no less than minimal trail running sneakers. They're also good for all day walkabouts. I plan on wearing them for a couple of half-marathon trail races in the fall, I'll update how they are on longer runs.

I wore this shoe for a short time on a hiking/backpacking trip.  We had to cross several streams, so wanted something that can get wet and still hike in.  These looked perfect as it said for hiking/running.  They are unfortunately way to thin and flimsy.  The bottom would flap from the current in the river, putting me off balance.  The bottom would also catch on rocks/edges while hiking, bending under itself frequently.  By about 2 hours of use the edges were also peeling and starting to fall apart.  I could not continue to wear them.  For this price point, I would have expected something much more strong and stable.  Great for having as a second pair of shoes when backpacking for slipping on to hang around camp in, as they are light weight and easy to carry.  However, they should be at least $40.00 cheaper.  These are not good hiking or running shoes unless you are on a clean smooth surface maybe.  Almost feels like $ store quality in the soles.  Very disappointed.
Wish I’d splurged and bought these to begin with instead of trying some less expensive ones that don’t work as well

评论概述: Nice sandals but buy a 1/2 size up - not down
评论详情: I bought these sandals for running and am very happy with them. The style I bought does not come in half sizes. I made the mistake of buying the half size smaller, rather than going up to the next size. So I had to send back the original pair. They are a little pricey, but I would still recommend because they are ultra comfortable and great for running.
For perfect, used their website to print out my size to make sure I was ordering the right size. Seriously the most comfortable sandal ever, it’s just like being barefoot.

评论概述: Must get your feet would love you for it!
评论详情: Love my xero sandals! I feel they have the right amount of flexibility and cushion. I am new to minimalist wearing and these are perfect. Walked all around town, the beach without any issues. Great grip when crossing over wet rocks.  I did size up. I am normally a size 7. The 7 did fit however the edge on the back of sandal pushed my foot forward making my pinkie toes stick out. Some people don’t mind that but I prefer my toes inside the sandal itself. So I ordered an 8 and it’s a great fit. If they did have half sizes I feel a 7.5 would be perfect as there would be less to tightened, but and extra pull it’s not a big deal.

This is my first pair of Xero shoes. I've had other barefoot brands and I love them all. These sandals are super lightweight and comfy. I was climbing all over wet rocks at the beach without slipping around. I'll probably buy more of them when I run these down. I would say they are kind of expensive for sandals though. I wish they were a little more affordable.

I really enjoyed these sandals. They lasted one summer without any major wear or anything breaking. I give these a low star review, because like I said they wore out after one summer. Stretched a bit, the fit is just different. Along with that I am shocked to see that these sandals DOUBLED in price since I bought them. These are not worth $84... They're really over marketing the barefoot  feel. Pretty ridiculous. I just went to order another pair and after seeing the price, I'll find a more reasonable brand that will hopefully last more than one year for $84.
Really like how the barefoot shoes feel when walking.. Helping with back pain
These are a perfect fit for flat-shoe lovers
I’m in between sizes and should have sized up. They seemed amazing though!
